DESCRIPTION: Enemies escape #yGrapple if #yGrapple is not applied that turn. Only one enemy may be #yGrappled at a time.
Hypnotized creatures buff the player, debuff themselves, and deal damage to themselves depending on their intent. They cannot escape combat.
Aberrations are Eldritch creatures that attack all enemies and damage those that debuff it.
Psychic damage ignores block, is blocked by Artifact charges, and does not scale with Strength.
Playing cards and dealing damage adds to your combo score, and playing cards increases your score multiplier. At the end of combat, you receive gold based on your score.
Grappled creatures with Submission take damage at the start of their turn and Submission increases by #b1.
